scripts.db:seed:container: docker-compose exec app npm run db:seed:internal
scripts.migration:generate:local: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' dotenv -e .local.env -- typeorm migration:generate src/database/migrations/InitMigration --dataSource src/database/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:generate:container: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' typeorm migration:generate dist/database/migrations/InitMigration --dataSource dist/database/data-source.js
scripts.migration:run:local: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' npx dotenv -e .local.env -- typeorm migration:run --dataSource src/database/data-source.ts
scripts.migration:run:container: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' npx typeorm migration:run --dataSource dist/database/data-source.js
scripts.migration:revert:container: NODE_OPTIONS='--loader ts-node/esm' dotenv -e .local.env -- typeorm migration:revert --dataSource src/database/data-source.ts
